en.title: Dr Emoto In HongKong.
en.content:
REPORT BY PHILIPPINES COUNTRY LICENSEE PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR JEREMY LOOI.

 

A HUGE crowd of 400 FE Leaders, Members, VIPs and Invited Guests packed into FusionExcel International's Hong Kong office in Tsim Sha Tsui on the 11th April 2010 to listen to world renowned scientist Dr Masaru Emoto's keynote lecture on "The Power Of Scalar Energized Water". 

Highlights Of The Event Include:

 

- Welcome Speech by Founding Director Mr KS Lee.
   
- Opening of Seminar by Dr Amir Farid's talk on "What is Scalar Energy?"
   
- Dr Masaru Emoto's keynote lecture "The Power of Scalar Energized Water".  
   
- Demonstrations on the power of FE's Quantum Pendant by Presidential Director Arthur Medina and Presidential Director Bong Hermosa. As usual FE's demonstrations never fails to impress new prospects.
   
- Presidential Director Arthur Medina's sharing with the audience was so powerful and inspirational that touches deep down into the hearts of the participants.
   
- Presidential Director Jeremy Looi in his sharing again emphasizes the importance of staying focus and determined in the pursuit of one’s goal. Reminding the audience that nothing is impossible if one just CONCEIVE it in his mind, BELIEVE in his heart and one day, you will ACHIEVE it in your hands!

 

FE's Hong Kong office had never been this packed before since it was officially opened almost a month ago. 95% of the attendees were Filipinos which further encouraged the 3 key leaders, Presidential Director Capt Eli, Presidential Director Arthur Medina and Presidential Director Jeremy Looi to strategize and support more closely to triple it's growth and not to rest on our laurels.

 

Dr Amir Farid managed to simplify a complicated subject into layman’s terms, supported by a series of great slides allowing the attendees to understand and appreciate FE's scalar energized products to the fullest.

 
Pushing the effectiveness of FE's products to it's limit and having rock solid faith behind it, Presidential Director Arthur Medina and newly minted Hong Kong's first Presidential Director Bong Hermosa had four ladies, all in their 40s and 50s, lifting the heaviest man in the room (our very own FE Shenzhen Warehouse Manager Alex) effortlessly to the amazement of everyone!
 
Dr Masaru Emoto concluded his 5 Asean country tour with FE in Hong Kong as the last destination for his seminar, the others being Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia and Philippines. The foresight and commitment of FE's management is again illustrated through this strategic collaboration with Dr Emoto. We must seize the moment and capitalize on it. No company has such a world-renowned scientist hyping our products with such conviction and personal endorsement. The global potential for FE's scalar energy products is simply enormous! We will soon be among the top MLM companies in the world and again I challenge my entire fellow FE associates to increase your activities and elevate your focus and commitment to another level so you may enjoy the fruits of your labor! Dive in with 212 degrees and change your life forever!   
 
Watch 212 Degrees Video : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fs6aOZtjFuk

See You At The Top! AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!
